doc:
David Rasche https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Rasche 0 David Rasche (born August 7, 1944) is an American theater, film and television actor who is best known for his portrayal of the title character in the 1980s satirical police sitcom Sledge Hammer! Since then he has often played characters in positions of authority, in both serious and comical turns. David_Rasche ( born August_7_,_1944 ) is an_American_theater_,_film_and_television_actor who is_best_known for his_portrayal of the_title_character in the_1980s_satirical_police_sitcom_Sledge_Hammer ! Since then he has_often_played characters in positions of authority , in both_serious_and_comical_turns .
